name: Honda ATV Fever
overview: In ATV Fever, take on the most challenging tracks in the world, and compete against the best in events, on dirt tracks, off road, and through treacherous mountains. Choose from 9 Honda ATVs to suit your racing style and the terrain. Bump riders if they get too close, use your turbo boost and jump to get clear of the "pack", and interact with moveable objects in each exotic location!
